title: Translation Issue: 'Insert Chart' not localized in Chinese context menu
description: The 'Insert Chart' option in the context menu is not properly translated into Chinese.
OB: The 'Insert Chart' option in the context menu is not translated into Chinese.
EB: When you right-click in the layout to bring up the context menu, the 'Insert Chart' option should be displayed in Chinese.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Create a report in a Chinese environment.
2. Right-click in the layout to bring up the context menu.
